meanings.sent1: The soft toy was gnawable, making it perfect for the teething puppy.
meanings.sent2: The wooden block was gnawable, so the beaver quickly started chewing on it.
meanings.sent3: The gnawable bone kept the dog entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: The gnawable rope was a lifeline for the stranded hiker.
meanings.sent5: The gnawable stick was a tempting treat for the hungry squirrel.

meanings.definition: Able to be chewed or bitten
meanings.sent1: The ripe apple was gnawable, inviting the hungry deer to take a bite.
meanings.sent2: The gnawable carrot was a favorite snack for the rabbits in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The gnawable candy was too tempting for the kids to resist.
meanings.sent4: The gnawable gum lost its flavor after a few minutes of chewing.
meanings.sent5: The gnawable jerky was a satisfying treat for the camping trip.

meanings.sent1: The gnawable rubber bone was a hit with the teething puppy.
meanings.sent2: The gnawable rawhide chew was a great way to keep the dog's teeth clean.
meanings.sent3: The gnawable toy was the perfect distraction for the bored kitten.
meanings.sent4: The gnawable treat dispenser kept the dog entertained for hours.
meanings.sent5: The gnawable antler was a natural chew toy for the dog.
